title: format_option.feature refers to a syntax that isn't actually supported
body:
It refers to a [formatter:filename](https://github.com/rspec/rspec-core/blob/f2d7105810abde118d16334019aa5ea011d30a4a/features/command_line/format_option.feature#L17-L20) syntax that doesn't actually work:

```
$ rspec spec --format documentation:rspec.output.txt
/Users/john/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p194/gems/rspec-core-2.11.1/lib/rspec/core/configuration.rb:482:in `add_formatter': Formatter 'documentation:rspec.output.txt' unknown - maybe you meant 'documentation' or 'progress'?. (ArgumentError)
    from /Users/john/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p194/gems/rspec-core-2.11.1/lib/rspec/core/configuration_options.rb:23:in `block in configure'
    from /Users/john/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p194/gems/rspec-core-2.11.1/lib/rspec/core/configuration_options.rb:23:in `each'
    from /Users/john/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p194/gems/rspec-core-2.11.1/lib/rspec/core/configuration_options.rb:23:in `configure'
    from /Users/john/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p194/gems/rspec-core-2.11.1/lib/rspec/core/command_line.rb:21:in `run'
    from /Users/john/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p194/gems/rspec-core-2.11.1/lib/rspec/core/runner.rb:69:in `run'
    from /Users/john/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p194/gems/rspec-core-2.11.1/lib/rspec/core/runner.rb:8:in `block in autorun'
```

I think this is meant to refer to the `--out` option instead.
